009package imagingbook.common.mser;
010
011import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
012import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
013import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogHide;
014import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
015import imagingbook.common.mser.components.ComponentTree.Method;
016import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
017
018/**
019 * Parameters for MSER detection. Instances of this class may be placed inside a
020 * {@link GenericDialog} using
021 * {@link DialogUtils#addToDialog(ParameterBundle, ij.gui.GenericDialog)}.
022 */
023public class MserParameters implements ParameterBundle<MserDetector> {
024        //{@link DialogUtils#addToDialog(ParameterBundle<?>, GenericDialog)}
025        @DialogLabel("Component tree method")
026        public Method method = Method.LinearTime;
027        
028        @DialogLabel("Delta")
029        public int delta = 5;                                                   // = \Delta
030        
031        @DialogLabel("Min component size (pixels)")
032        public int minAbsComponentArea = 3;
033        
034        @DialogLabel("Min rel. component size")
035        public double minRelCompSize = 0.0001;          // = \alpha_{\min}
036        
037        @DialogLabel("Max rel. component size")
038        public double maxRelCompSize = 0.25;            // = \alpha_{\max}
039        
040        @DialogLabel("Max component size variation")
041        public double maxSizeVariation = 0.25;
042        
043        @DialogLabel("Min component diversity")
044        public double minDiversity = 0.50;
045        
046        @DialogLabel("Constrain ellipse size")
047        public boolean constrainEllipseSize = true;
048        
049        @DialogLabel("Min region compactness")
050        public double minCompactness = 0.2;
051        
052        @DialogLabel("Validate component tree")@DialogHide
053        public boolean validateComponentTree = false;
054}
